F

findWinner(int, int) - Static method in class WarGame
This method takes two para meters user and comp, divides them by 4 and stores the subsequent values back into their respective variables.

G

genInput() - Static method in class WarGame
This method generates a random integer between 1 and 52 and returns it.
getInput(Scanner) - Static method in class WarGame
This method prompts the user to enter an integer between 1 - 52, then reads the integer.
getRank(int) - Static method in class WarGame
This method takes the parameter num, divides it by 4 then stores the result back into num.
getSuit(int) - Static method in class WarGame
This method gets a value num and stores it's modulus by 4 remainder back into num.

M

This method acts as the index for the program.

P

printRoundInfo(int, int, int) - Static method in class WarGame
This method prints out the round number followed by which cards the user and computer have chosen.
printRoundResult(int, int, int) - Static method in class WarGame
This method, first calls the findWinner() with user and comp as parameters and stores its returned value in an integer called winner.
